FOUND IN: Straight - A sequence of consecutive cards, regardless of suit (e.g., 5-6-7-8-9).
String - A thin length of pliable material such as thread, twine, or wire used for tying, binding, or hanging things up.
Vitriolic - Using biting sarcasm or severe criticism through words; highly acidic language.
Blunderingly - In a clumsy or awkward manner due to error ("blunder")
Bourse de Paris - The official name for the Paris Stock Exchange.
